column1: Traffic reports will resume Thursday February 9 at 4:00 p.m.

column3: TRAFFIC ALERT FOR I-75N AT THE NORTHERN SPLIT:
column4: All traffic is being diverted to I-75N due to an injury collision.
I-64W near the 74.6 MM (just west of the northern split)
column5: The right lane is blocked until further notice due to a semi on its side off the roadway.
